Everybody has a right to his own opinion. However, sometimes it's better not to tell anybody what that opinion is.	Alle har ret til at have sin egen mening. Men nogle gange er det bedre ikke at fortælle nogen, hvad denne mening er.
Tom was sad when he discovered that Mary was a gold digger and Mary was sad when she discovered that Tom was poor.	Tom blev ked af det da han opdagede at Mary var en golddigger og Mary blev ked af det da hun opdagede at Tom var fattig.
Tom let the cat out of the bag when he accidentally told his mother about the surprise party being planned for her.	Tom slap katten ud af sækken da han ved et uheld kom til at fortælle sin mor om surprisepartyet der var ved at blive planlagt for hende.
Tom speaks French with his mother and English with his father. If all three of them are speaking together, they speak French.	Tom taler fransk med sin mor og engelsk med sin far. Hvis de alle tre taler sammen, taler de fransk.
Gossipmongers had a field day when Elizabeth Taylor and Richard Burton started an affair while they were both married to other people.	Sladdertanter havde kronede dage da Elizabeth Taylor og Richard Burton indledte en affære mens de begge var gift med andre mennesker.
Tom and Mary filled balloons with water and dropped them from the balcony down on to unsuspecting pedestrians walking on the pavement below.	Tom og Mary fyldte balloner med vand og kastede dem ud fra balkonen ned på intetanende fodgængere der gik på fortovet nedenfor.
If you translate from your second language into your own native language, rather than the other way around, you're less likely to make mistakes.	Hvis man oversætter fra sit andetsprog til sit modersmål, i stedet for omvendt, er der mindre sandsynlighed for at man laver fejl.
